content: This was supported by continued strength in our contract revenue, which was $28.8 million for the fourth quarter, 18% higher than the fourth quarter of last year and at the higher end of our guided range of $28 million to $29 million, and strengthened our excess usage revenue, which was $6.9 million for the quarter, which while being down 8% year-over-year was above the high end of our guidance range of $5.7 million to $6.2 million.
